Our Amazing Team

Small, but growing

Jim Hildensperger

Lead Developer

I'm an engineer with an eye for design and a passion for creating captivating user experiences. I love sports, travel, technology, and craft beer. My experience includes work on more than a dozen iOS applications for both iPhone and iPad using almost every framework of the SDK. I've also worked with Android, OSX, and Ruby applications in personal and professional projects.

Asha Indralingam

Content/Marketing Specialist

With senior level experience in the tech world, I've well-versed in the nuances of content curation and mobile marketing. I'm passionate about community-centric products and content strategy. To date, I've worked at multiple startups in San Francisco, from an early stage content curation website and the world’s largest social good platform to a midsize gaming studio and more. I’ve been there, launched this and rebranded that.

Taplister

We were tasked with designing and implementing a completely new version of Taplister's iOS application to give them a current look and feel. We delivered the third version of Taplister for iPhone and iPad, written entirely in Swift, in just one month.

  • Client: Taplister
  • Date: December 2015
  • Service: iOS Application Development
  • Technology: Swift, CocoaPods

Treats SDK

We worked with the Treats SDK on major features in their framework as they ramped up their team. Our main focus and contributions were setting up the build systems and infrastructure for the developement of an entirely Swift dynamic framework. We also set up the CocoaPod for easy installation and version management of their public releases.

  • Client: Treats
  • Date: August 2015
  • Service: iOS SDK Development
  • Technology: Swift, CocoaPods
